title: I stopped drinking for 10 years now and I'm really feeling the pressure
body: Not of temptation, but of sorrow. My heart is really heavy of brokenness and just heart breaks, I really am wanted to drink to really drown myself out of this. I honestly don't know what to do. I've always pride myself in quitting alcohol for years now, and this sorrow is really driving me to go against what I pride myself in.
